00070 /* Convert the object-space axis-aligned bounding box (expressed as
00071  * its minimum and maximum corners) into a screen-space rectangle,
00072  * returns zero if the result is empty */
00073 int paint_convert_bb_to_rect(rcti *rect,
00074                              const float bb_min[3],
00075                              const float bb_max[3],
00076                              const ARegion *ar,
00077                              RegionView3D *rv3d,
00078                              Object *ob)
00079 {
00080     float projection_mat[4][4];
00081     int i, j, k;
00082 
00083     rect->xmin = rect->ymin = INT_MAX;
00084     rect->xmax = rect->ymax = INT_MIN;
00085 
00086     /* return zero if the bounding box has non-positive volume */
00087     if (bb_min[0] > bb_max[0] || bb_min[1] > bb_max[1] || bb_min[2] > bb_max[2])
00088         return 0;
00089 
00090     ED_view3d_ob_project_mat_get(rv3d, ob, projection_mat);
00091 
00092     for (i = 0; i < 2; ++i) {
00093         for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00094             for (k = 0; k < 2; ++k) {
00095                 float vec[3], proj[2];
00096                 vec[0] = i ? bb_min[0] : bb_max[0];
00097                 vec[1] = j ? bb_min[1] : bb_max[1];
00098                 vec[2] = k ? bb_min[2] : bb_max[2];
00099                 /* convert corner to screen space */
00100                 ED_view3d_project_float_v2(ar, vec, proj, projection_mat);
00101                 /* expand 2D rectangle */
00102                 rect->xmin = MIN2(rect->xmin, proj[0]);
00103                 rect->xmax = MAX2(rect->xmax, proj[0]);
00104                 rect->ymin = MIN2(rect->ymin, proj[1]);
00105                 rect->ymax = MAX2(rect->ymax, proj[1]);
00106             }
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110     /* return false if the rectangle has non-positive area */
00111     return rect->xmin < rect->xmax && rect->ymin < rect->ymax;
00112 }
00113 
00114 /* Get four planes in object-space that describe the projection of
00115  * screen_rect from screen into object-space (essentially converting a
00116  * 2D screens-space bounding box into four 3D planes) */
00117 void paint_calc_redraw_planes(float planes[4][4],
00118                               const ARegion *ar,
00119                               RegionView3D *rv3d,
00120                               Object *ob,
00121                               const rcti *screen_rect)
00122 {
00123     BoundBox bb;
00124     bglMats mats;
00125     rcti rect;
00126 
00127     memset(&bb, 0, sizeof(BoundBox));
00128     view3d_get_transformation(ar, rv3d, ob, &mats);
00129 
00130     /* use some extra space just in case */
00131     rect = *screen_rect;
00132     rect.xmin -= 2;
00133     rect.xmax += 2;
00134     rect.ymin -= 2;
00135     rect.ymax += 2;
00136 
00137     ED_view3d_calc_clipping(&bb, planes, &mats, &rect);
00138     mul_m4_fl(planes, -1.0f);
00139 }
00140 
00141 /* convert a point in model coordinates to 2D screen coordinates */
00142 /* TODO: can be deleted once all calls are replaced with
00143  * view3d_project_float() */
00144 void projectf(bglMats *mats, const float v[3], float p[2])
00145 {
00146     double ux, uy, uz;
00147 
00148     gluProject(v[0], v[1], v[2], mats->modelview, mats->projection,
00149                (GLint *)mats->viewport, &ux, &uy, &uz);
00150     p[0] = ux;
00151     p[1] = uy;
00152 }
00153 
00154 float paint_calc_object_space_radius(ViewContext *vc, const float center[3],
00155                                      float pixel_radius)
00156 {
00157     Object *ob = vc->obact;
00158     float delta[3], scale, loc[3];
00159     float mval_f[2];
00160 
00161     mul_v3_m4v3(loc, ob->obmat, center);
00162 
00163     initgrabz(vc->rv3d, loc[0], loc[1], loc[2]);
00164 
00165     mval_f[0] = pixel_radius;
00166     mval_f[1] = 0.0f;
00167     ED_view3d_win_to_delta(vc->ar, mval_f, delta);
00168 
00169     scale = fabsf(mat4_to_scale(ob->obmat));
00170     scale = (scale == 0.0f) ? 1.0f : scale;
00171 
00172     return len_v3(delta) / scale;
00173 }
00174 
00175 float paint_get_tex_pixel(Brush *br, float u, float v)
00176 {
00177     TexResult texres;
00178     float co[3];
00179     int hasrgb;
00180 
00181     co[0] = u;
00182     co[1] = v;
00183     co[2] = 0;
00184 
00185     memset(&texres, 0, sizeof(TexResult));
00186     hasrgb = multitex_ext(br->mtex.tex, co, NULL, NULL, 0, &texres);
00187 
00188     if (hasrgb & TEX_RGB)
00189         texres.tin = (0.35f * texres.tr + 0.45f * texres.tg + 0.2f * texres.tb) * texres.ta;
00190 
00191     return texres.tin;
00192 }

00194 /* 3D Paint */
00195 
00196 static void imapaint_project(Object *ob, float model[][4], float proj[][4], const float co[3], float pco[4])
00197 {
00198     copy_v3_v3(pco, co);
00199     pco[3] = 1.0f;
00200 
00201     mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, pco);
00202     mul_m4_v3(model, pco);
00203     mul_m4_v4(proj, pco);
00204 }
00205 
00206 static void imapaint_tri_weights(Object *ob,
00207                                  const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float v3[3],
00208                                  const float co[3], float w[3])
00209 {
00210     float pv1[4], pv2[4], pv3[4], h[3], divw;
00211     float model[4][4], proj[4][4], wmat[3][3], invwmat[3][3];
00212     GLint view[4];
00213 
00214     /* compute barycentric coordinates */
00215 
00216     /* get the needed opengl matrices */
00217     glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, view);
00218     glGetFloatv(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX,  (float *)model);
00219     glGetFloatv(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, (float *)proj);
00220     view[0] = view[1] = 0;
00221 
00222     /* project the verts */
00223     imapaint_project(ob, model, proj, v1, pv1);
00224     imapaint_project(ob, model, proj, v2, pv2);
00225     imapaint_project(ob, model, proj, v3, pv3);
00226 
00227     /* do inverse view mapping, see gluProject man page */
00228     h[0] = (co[0] - view[0]) * 2.0f / view[2] - 1;
00229     h[1] = (co[1] - view[1]) * 2.0f / view[3] - 1;
00230     h[2] = 1.0f;
00231 
00232     /* solve for (w1,w2,w3)/perspdiv in:
00233      * h * perspdiv = Project * Model * (w1 * v1 + w2 * v2 + w3 * v3) */
00234 
00235     wmat[0][0] = pv1[0];  wmat[1][0] = pv2[0];  wmat[2][0] = pv3[0];
00236     wmat[0][1] = pv1[1];  wmat[1][1] = pv2[1];  wmat[2][1] = pv3[1];
00237     wmat[0][2] = pv1[3];  wmat[1][2] = pv2[3];  wmat[2][2] = pv3[3];
00238 
00239     invert_m3_m3(invwmat, wmat);
00240     mul_m3_v3(invwmat, h);
00241 
00242     copy_v3_v3(w, h);
00243 
00244     /* w is still divided by perspdiv, make it sum to one */
00245     divw = w[0] + w[1] + w[2];
00246     if (divw != 0.0f) {
00247         mul_v3_fl(w, 1.0f / divw);
00248     }
00249 }
00250 
00251 /* compute uv coordinates of mouse in face */
00252 void imapaint_pick_uv(Scene *scene, Object *ob, unsigned int faceindex, const int xy[2], float uv[2])
00253 {
00254     DerivedMesh *dm = mesh_get_derived_final(scene, ob, CD_MASK_BAREMESH);
00255     const int *index = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00256     MTFace *tface = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_MTFACE), *tf;
00257     int numfaces = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm), a, findex;
00258     float p[2], w[3], absw, minabsw;
00259     MFace mf;
00260     MVert mv[4];
00261 
00262     minabsw = 1e10;
00263     uv[0] = uv[1] = 0.0;
00264 
00265     /* test all faces in the derivedmesh with the original index of the picked face */
00266     for (a = 0; a < numfaces; a++) {
00267         findex = index ? index[a] : a;
00268 
00269         if (findex == faceindex) {
00270             dm->getTessFace(dm, a, &mf);
00271 
00272             dm->getVert(dm, mf.v1, &mv[0]);
00273             dm->getVert(dm, mf.v2, &mv[1]);
00274             dm->getVert(dm, mf.v3, &mv[2]);
00275             if (mf.v4)
00276                 dm->getVert(dm, mf.v4, &mv[3]);
00277 
00278             tf = &tface[a];
00279 
00280             p[0] = xy[0];
00281             p[1] = xy[1];
00282 
00283             if (mf.v4) {
00284                 /* the triangle with the largest absolute values is the one
00285                  * with the most negative weights */
00286                 imapaint_tri_weights(ob, mv[0].co, mv[1].co, mv[3].co, p, w);
00287                 absw = fabs(w[0]) + fabs(w[1]) + fabs(w[2]);
00288                 if (absw < minabsw) {
00289                     uv[0] = tf->uv[0][0] * w[0] + tf->uv[1][0] * w[1] + tf->uv[3][0] * w[2];
00290                     uv[1] = tf->uv[0][1] * w[0] + tf->uv[1][1] * w[1] + tf->uv[3][1] * w[2];
00291                     minabsw = absw;
00292                 }
00293 
00294                 imapaint_tri_weights(ob, mv[1].co, mv[2].co, mv[3].co, p, w);
00295                 absw = fabs(w[0]) + fabs(w[1]) + fabs(w[2]);
00296                 if (absw < minabsw) {
00297                     uv[0] = tf->uv[1][0] * w[0] + tf->uv[2][0] * w[1] + tf->uv[3][0] * w[2];
00298                     uv[1] = tf->uv[1][1] * w[0] + tf->uv[2][1] * w[1] + tf->uv[3][1] * w[2];
00299                     minabsw = absw;
00300                 }
00301             }
00302             else {
00303                 imapaint_tri_weights(ob, mv[0].co, mv[1].co, mv[2].co, p, w);
00304                 absw = fabs(w[0]) + fabs(w[1]) + fabs(w[2]);
00305                 if (absw < minabsw) {
00306                     uv[0] = tf->uv[0][0] * w[0] + tf->uv[1][0] * w[1] + tf->uv[2][0] * w[2];
00307                     uv[1] = tf->uv[0][1] * w[0] + tf->uv[1][1] * w[1] + tf->uv[2][1] * w[2];
00308                     minabsw = absw;
00309                 }
00310             }
00311         }
00312     }
00313 
00314     dm->release(dm);
00315 }
00316 
00317 /* returns 0 if not found, otherwise 1 */
00318 int imapaint_pick_face(ViewContext *vc, const int mval[2], unsigned int *index, unsigned int totface)
00319 {
00320     if (totface == 0)
00321         return 0;
00322 
00323     /* sample only on the exact position */
00324     *index = view3d_sample_backbuf(vc, mval[0], mval[1]);
00325 
00326     if ((*index) <= 0 || (*index) > (unsigned int)totface) {
00327         return 0;
00328     }
00329 
00330     (*index)--;
00331     
00332     return 1;
00333 }
00334 
00335 /* used for both 3d view and image window */
00336 void paint_sample_color(Scene *scene, ARegion *ar, int x, int y)    /* frontbuf */
00337 {
00338     Brush *br = paint_brush(paint_get_active(scene));
00339     unsigned int col;
00340     char *cp;
00341 
00342     CLAMP(x, 0, ar->winx);
00343     CLAMP(y, 0, ar->winy);
00344     
00345     glReadBuffer(GL_FRONT);
00346     glReadPixels(x + ar->winrct.xmin, y + ar->winrct.ymin, 1, 1, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, &col);
00347     glReadBuffer(GL_BACK);
00348 
00349     cp = (char *)&col;
00350     
00351     if (br) {
00352         br->rgb[0] = cp[0] / 255.0f;
00353         br->rgb[1] = cp[1] / 255.0f;
00354         br->rgb[2] = cp[2] / 255.0f;
00355     }
00356 }

00358 static int brush_curve_preset_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00359 {
00360     Brush *br = paint_brush(paint_get_active(CTX_data_scene(C)));
00361     brush_curve_preset(br, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "shape"));
00362 
00363     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00364 }
00365 
00366 static int brush_curve_preset_poll(bContext *C)
00367 {
00368     Brush *br = paint_brush(paint_get_active(CTX_data_scene(C)));
00369 
00370     return br && br->curve;
00371 }

00373 void BRUSH_OT_curve_preset(wmOperatorType *ot)
00374 {
00375     static EnumPropertyItem prop_shape_items[] = {
00376         {CURVE_PRESET_SHARP, "SHARP", 0, "Sharp", ""},
00377         {CURVE_PRESET_SMOOTH, "SMOOTH", 0, "Smooth", ""},
00378         {CURVE_PRESET_MAX, "MAX", 0, "Max", ""},
00379         {CURVE_PRESET_LINE, "LINE", 0, "Line", ""},
00380         {CURVE_PRESET_ROUND, "ROUND", 0, "Round", ""},
00381         {CURVE_PRESET_ROOT, "ROOT", 0, "Root", ""},
00382         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00383 
00384     ot->name = "Preset";
00385     ot->description = "Set brush shape";
00386     ot->idname = "BRUSH_OT_curve_preset";
00387 
00388     ot->exec = brush_curve_preset_exec;
00389     ot->poll = brush_curve_preset_poll;
00390 
00391     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "shape", prop_shape_items, CURVE_PRESET_SMOOTH, "Mode", "");
00392 }

00556 void PAINT_OT_face_select_reveal(wmOperatorType *ot)
00557 {
00558     ot->name = "Face Select Reveal";
00559     ot->description = "Reveal hidden faces";
